headline: NVR, Inc. Appoints Michael J. DeVito as an Independent Director, Effective July 1, 2025
summary: NVR, Inc. announced that Michael J. DeVito has been appointed to its Board of Directors as an independent director effective July 1, 2025. Mr. DeVito was the Chief Executive Officer and an Executive...

headline: NVR, INC. APPOINTS NEW MEMBER TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS
summary: NVR, Inc. (NYSE: NVR) announced today that Michael J. DeVito has been appointed to its Board of Directors as an independent director effective July 1, 2025.
